column4: I got a new laptop, should I go for 10..04 or get the 10.10.?
10.10 isn't so bad, but it is just hitting release candidate.  you can install 10.04, or install 10.10... I've been really happy w/ 10.10 on 3 machines
not much new.. just program updates.. and the installer is a little different(thats all i've noticed)
